trans-unit.source: An activity that receives a message as part of a request/reply message exchange pattern.
trans-unit.target: 요청/회신 메시지 교환 패턴의 일부로 메시지를 받는 활동입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the value of the action header of the message.
trans-unit.target: 메시지의 작업 헤더의 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content received by the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply"></xref> activity
trans-unit.target: 받은 콘텐츠를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply"> </xref> 활동

trans-unit.source: The content can be one of the following types: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent>.
trans-unit.target: 콘텐츠는 다음 유형 중 하나일 수 있습니다: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent>또는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent> when receiving a message <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> or a message contract type.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent>메시지를 받을 때 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>또는 메시지 계약 형식을.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent> when receiving data contract types.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent>때 데이터 계약 형식을 받을.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of correlation initializers.
Gets or sets a reference to the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send"></xref> activity paired with this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply"></xref> activity.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 참조를 가져오거나는 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send"> </xref> 활동 쌍을 이루는 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply"> </xref> 활동입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply> activities are used together to model a request/response message exchange pattern.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send>및 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply>활동은 요청/응답 메시지 교환 패턴을 모델링 하는 데 함께 사용 됩니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply></xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send>

trans-unit.source: This property specifies which <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> activity the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply> activity is paired with.
